author: pietverwilligen
body:
This pull request brings finally the GEMCSC code into the release.
This code has been around for more than a year in private branches,
first of the original developer (Raffaella Radogna), then in mine.

Changes implemented before committing to the release:
- change CLHEP matrices --> SMatrices
- factorizing the fit in GEMCSCSegFit.cc as was done by Tim Cox for CSCSegment
- removed the use of Ensembles, just work with vectors of CSCLayers and GEM Eta Partitions
- uniform approach to GEM RecHits and CSC RecHits: use of TrackingRecHit
- implemented LogDebug messages
- necessary multithreading: edm::stream::EDProducer and getByToken

Further on I had a look at @cvuosalo's comments on #8912 and checked for these.
title: Gemcsc segment 75X
